post.author: 하수용
post.content:
Position has been filled up. Please do not reply anymore
Thank you


>Neo Informatics which is located in montreal Quebec is a cutting edge internet company, leader in its four core business areas: Web Application Development, Search Engine Optimizations, Web Site Development and Hosting and hardware & software security.
>
>We are looking for an individual with an above high interest in web computer programming and desktop programming, with strong analytical abilities that is capable of grasping multiple complex interactions between various JavaScript, php, and Java ,Delphi.
>
>Requirements:
>
> Minimum 3 years proven professional working experience in Java/혻혻혻혻JavaScript, Delphi.
> Strong analytical and defensive programming methodologies.
> Autonomous, able to debug, configure and setup web servers.
> English spoken and written.
>
>Assets:
>
> Knowledge of J2EE
> Knowledge of JBoss and Tomcat.
>
>Please forward your resume to career@neoinformatics.com
>
>
>
post.title: [re] Looking for java programmer
